channel.title: Daily on Home of Srđan Đukić
channel.description: Recent content in Daily on Home of Srđan Đukić

item.title: Thursday and daily blogging
item.description: A random Thursday in August Link to heading So, in order to try and slay my own demons of procrastination and a general feeling of not achieving anything, I’ve decided to start blogging regularly about all the big and small achievements every day. Today I: Solved two basic HackerRank exercises: Drawing Book func pageCount(n int32, p int32) int32 { numBuckets := n/2 bucketNumber := p/2 wayFromBack := numBuckets - bucketNumber if (bucketNumber < wayFromBack){ return bucketNumber } else { return wayFromBack } } Which was surprisingly easy in the end, but for some reason I massively over-thought it when I first looked at it.
